Definition at line 134 of file qmapplication.cc.

bool votca::ctp::QMApplication::EvaluateOptions ( void   )  [virtual]

Process command line options.

Returns:
true to contine, false to stop
EvaluateOptions is called by Run after parsing the command line. return true if everything is ok, false to stop and show help text.

Reimplemented from votca::tools::Application.

Reimplemented in QMAppRun, and Polymer.

void votca::ctp::QMApplication::Initialize ( void   )  [virtual]

Initialize application data.

Initialize is called by run before parsing the command line. All necesassary command line arguments can be added here

Reimplemented from votca::tools::Application.

void votca::ctp::QMApplication::Run ( void   )  [virtual]

Main body of application.

Run is called after command line was parsed + evaluated. All the work should be done in here.

starting frame

number of frames to be processed

load qmtop from state saver
